desc.cn: 一个实验性的现代化 git CLI，构建在 git 之上，能提供丰富的 git 命令和选项的相关建议
desc.en: `bit` is an experimental modernized git CLI built on top of git that provides happy defaults

/curl.cmd:
curl -sf https://gobinaries.com/chriswalz/bit | sh
&& bit complete
&& echo "Type bit then press <ENTER> to show interactive prompt"
&& bit

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew install bit-git
&& bit complete
&& bit

darwin/port.cmd: sudo port selfupdate && sudo port install bit

/zinit.cmd:
zinit ice lucit wait"0" as"program" from"gh-r" pick"bit"
&& zinit light "chriswalz/bit"
